Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to removing residency requirements for Franklin county assistant district attorneys
Summary: Removes residency requirements for persons holding the office of assistant district attorney for the county of Franklin; provides that a person holding such office may reside in Franklin county or an adjoining county within the state.
LawCode: Amd ยง3, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to removing residency requirements for Franklin county assistant district attorneys
